description:
Lightweight trail shorts to help little rippers make the most out of their trail time.

  • Stretchy nylon blend wicks away moistures, dries quickly, and feels great against your skin
  • DWR finish means these shorts shed light precipitation and trail muck with ease
  • Elastic waistband and pull-on design, lays flat against your body and tucks comfortably under hip packs and hydration pack hip belts
  • Dual front pockets
  • Gusseted crotch leaves lots of room to move, and to accommodate your favourite liner shorts
name: MEC Pinned Bike Shorts - Youths
